title: Did 28 million mails on the ballot go to "failure" in the last four elections?
subtitle: "Inflating the votes of voters who chose not to vote with "loss" of votes is a fundamental flaw," said the call group, voting at home.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: In four elections from 2012 to 2018, a total of 28 million postcards went "missing."
